title: Major signal fault on Circle Line causing delays

updates.text: [CCL] CLEARED: Train services from #PayaLebar towards #DhobyGhaut are now operating normally.
[CCL] UPDATE: Estimate 10 mins additional travelling time from #PayaLebar to #DhobyGhaut towards #DhobyGhaut due to signal fault.
[CCL] UPDATE: Estimate 20 mins additional travelling time from #PayaLebar to #DhobyGhaut towards #DhobyGhaut due to signal fault.
[CCL]: Estimate 20 mins additional travelling time from #PayaLebar to #DhobyGhaut towards #DhobyGhaut due to signal fault.
